sourcesContent:
import React,{useState, useEffect, useCallback, useRef} from 'react'

const App = () => {



  return(
    <>
    <input type="text" value={''} placeholder='choose your password' readOnly/>
    <button>Copy Password</button>
    <input type="range" min={3} max={30} id="PasswordLength"/>
    <label htmlFor="PasswordLength">Length: {}</label>
    <input type='checked' id="NumberPassword" />
    <label htmlFor="NumberPassword">Number</label>
    <input type='checked' id="CharacterPassword" />
    <label htmlFor="CharacterPassword">Character</label>
    </>
  )
}

export default App
